BungieService.DevVersion: Are you running a development version of DIM? You must register your chrome extension with bungie.net.
BungieService.Difficulties: The Bungie API is currently experiencing difficulties.
BungieService.Throttled: Bungie API throttling limit exceeded. Please wait a bit and then retry.
BungieService.NotLoggedIn: Please log into Bungie.net in order to use this extension.
BungieService.Maintenance: Bungie.net servers are down for maintenance.
BungieService.NoAccount: No Destiny account was found on {platform}. Do you have the right platform selected?
BungieService.NoAccountForPlatform: Failed to find a Destiny account for you on {platform}.
BungieService.NotConnected: You may not be connected to the internet.
BungieService.ItemUniquenessExplanation: You tried to move the '{name}' {type} to your {character} but that destination already has that item and is only allowed one.

Error.Class: Cannot compare this item as it is not for a {class}.
Error.Archetype: Cannot compare this item as it is not a {type}.

DidYouKnow.Collapse: You just collapsed a section in DIM! This might be useful to hide parts of DIM that you don't need to normally use.
DidYouKnow.DoubleClick: If you're moving an item to your currently active (last logged in) character, you can instead double click that item to instantly equip it.
DidYouKnow.DragAndDrop: Items can be dragged and dropped between different characters/vault columns.
DidYouKnow.Expand: To re-expand a section, simply click the plus sign icon on the far left of the category you collapsed.

FarmingMode.Desc: DIM is moving Engram and Glimmer items from {store} to the vault and leaving one space open per item type to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.

MakeRoom.Desc: DIM is moving only Engram and Glimmer items from {store} to the vault or other characters to prevent anything from going to the Postmaster.
MakeRoom.MakeRoom: Make room to pick up items by moving equipment
MakeRoom.Tooltip: If checked, DIM will move weapons and armor around to make space in the vault for engrams.

FarmingMode.OutOfRoom: You're out of space to move items off of {character}. Time to decrypt some engrams and clear out the trash!

Help.CannotMove: Cannot move that item off this character.
Help.Drag: Hold shift or pause over drop zone to transfer a partial stack.
Help.ChangingPerksInfo: Sorry, there's no way to change perks outside the game. We wish we could!

Version.Beta: Beta has been updated to v{version}

Infusion.NoTransfer:
Transfer infusion material
 {target} cannot be moved.
Infusion.ShowItems: Show infusable items across all characters and vault

ItemInfoService.SaveInfoErrorDescription: There's been a problem saving DIM-specific info for an item. One problem is that there is a limit on how much data can be stored - this is why tags and notes have not yet been allowed out of the Beta version. The error was: {error}.

ItemMove.Distributed:
Distributed {name}
 {name} is now equally divided between characters.
ItemMove.ToVault: All {name} are now in your vault.

ItemService.BucketFull: There are too many '{itemtype}' items {isVault, select, true{in the} false{on your}} {store}.
ItemService.Classified: This item is classified and cannot be transferred at this time.
ItemService.Classified2: Classified item. Bungie does not yet provide information about this item. Item is not yet transferable.
ItemService.Deequip: Cannot find another item to equip in order to dequip {itemname}
ItemService.ExoticError: '{itemname}' cannot be equipped because the exotic in the {slot} slot cannot be unequipped. ({error})
ItemService.NotEnoughRoom: There's nothing we can move out of {store} to make room for {itemname}
ItemService.OnlyEquippedLevel: This can only be equipped on characters at or above level {level}.
ItemService.OnlyEquippedClassLevel: This can only be equipped on a {class} at or above level {level}.
ItemService.TooMuch: Looks like you requested to move more of this item than exists in the source!
ItemService.TwoExotics: We don't know how you got more than 2 equipped exotics!

LB.LockedHelp: Drag and drop any item into its bucket to build set with that specific gear. Shift + click to exclude items.

ProcessingMode.HelpFast: Only looks at your best gear.
ProcessingMode.HelpFull: Looks at more gear, but takes longer.

LightMode.HelpScaled: Calculates loadouts as if all items were 350 defense.
LightMode.HelpCurrent: Calculates loadouts at current defense levels.

Help.Lock: Lock a set of perks by clicking a lock bucket and selecting perks
Help.NoPerk: If a perk doesn't appear it means that you own no armor with that perk
Help.MultiPerk: To use armor with multiple perks together shift+click the desired perks
Help.Or: Armor with any of these perks will be used ("or")
Help.And: Armor with all of these perks will be used ("and")
Help.DragAndDrop: Drag and drop items into the locked buckets to build sets with only that gear
Help.ShiftClick: Shift click an item to build sets without that gear
Help.Tier11Example: 4/5/2 (a Tier 11 build) is 4 Intellect, 5 Discipline, 2 Strength (4+5+2 = Tier 11)
Help.Intellect: Intellect speeds up Super recharge time
Help.Discipline: Discipline speeds up Grenade recharge time
Help.Strength: Strength speeds up Melee recharge time
Help.Synergy: Try to find armor that has ammo increasing perks for weapon types that you use.
Help.ChangeNodes: Change the Intellect, Discipline, or Strength nodes in game to what is displayed to create each loadout.
Help.StatsIncrease: As an items defense level increases, the stats on that item (int/dis/str) also increase.

LB.ExcludeHelp: Shift + click an item (or drag and drop into this bucket) to build sets without specific gear.
LB.Missing1: Missing legendary or exotic pieces to build a full set!
LB.Missing2: Missing rare, legendary, or exotic pieces to build a full set!

Loadouts.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'?
Loadouts.Randomize: Randomize your equipped weapons, armor, ghost, and artifact?
Loadouts.VendorsCannotEquip: These vendor items cannot be equipped:
Loadouts.MaxSlots: You can only have {slots} of that kind of item in a loadout.
Loadouts.OnlyItems: Only equippable items, materials, and consumables can be added to a loadout.
Loadouts.NoEngrams: No non-exotic engrams are available to transfer.
Loadouts.NoExotics: No engrams are available to transfer.
Loadouts.ItemsWithIcon: Items with this icon will be equipped. Click on an item to toggle equip.
Loadouts.TooManyRequested: You have {total} {itemname} but your loadout asks for {requested} We transfered all you had.
Loadouts.Applied: Your {amount, plural, =1{single item loadout has} other{loadout of # items have}} been transferred to your {store}.
Loadouts.AppliedError: None of the items in your loadout could be transferred.
Loadouts.AppliedWarn: Your loadout has been partially transferred, but {failed} of {total} items had errors.
Loadouts.MakeRoomDone: Finished making room for {postmasterNum, plural, =1{1 Postmaster item} other{# Postmaster items}} by moving {movedNum, plural, =1{1 item} other{# items}} off of {store}.
Loadouts.MakeRoomError: Unable to make room for all Postmaster items: {error}.

Manifest.Download: Downloading latest Destiny info from Bungie
Manifest.OutdatedExplanation: Bungie has updated their Destiny info database. Reload DIM to pick up the new info. Note that some things in DIM may not work for a few hours after Bungie updates Destiny, as the new data propagates through their systems.

MoveAmount.UpStack: Increase up to the next full stack
MoveAmount.DownStack: Decrease down to the next full stack

Postmaster.Desc: There are 20 lost items at the Postmaster on your {store}. Any new items will overwrite the existing.

Settings.HideUnfilteredHelp: Items that do not match filter criteria will be hidden.
Settings.AlwaysShowDetailsHelp: Clicking on an item will show a popup that can be expanded to show perk and stat details.  This option will always show that detail when you click on an item.
Settings.EnableAdvancedStats: Enable advanced stat quality comparison features
Settings.EnableAdvancedStatsHelp: Will enable advanced min/max features on the move dialog and enable the armor comparison view.
Settings.ShowOverlay: Show new items with an overlay
Settings.ShowOverlayHelp: Will show new items with an overlay.
Settings.ShowAnimations: Show new item overlay animations on new items.
Settings.ShowAnimationsHelp: Will show the animated new item overlay on new items. Turning this off can save CPU cycles.
Settings.ShowElemental: Show elemental damage icons on weapons
Settings.ShowElementalHelp: Show elemental damage icons on weapons.
Settings.SetSortHelp: Sort items by rarity or their primary stat value.
Settings.InventoryColumnsHelp: Select the number of columns for character inventory.
Settings.VaultColumnsHelp: Select the maximum number of columns for vault.
Settings.CharacterOrderHelp: Characters can be ordered by last login or based on their creation date.
Settings.ExportSSHelp: Download a CSV list of your items that can be easily viewed in the spreadsheet app of your choice.

Stats.PercentHelp: Click for more information about what Stats Quality is.
Stats.Prestige:
Prestige Level: {level}
{exp}xp until 5 motes of light.

SyncService.GoogleDriveReAuth: To re-authorize google drive, must restart your browser.
SyncService.OneItemTooLarge: Your save file has an item that is too large. Most likely a saved loadout has too many items.
SyncService.SaveTooLarge: Your save file is too large.  Remove saved loadouts.

Vendors.Compare: Compare with what you already have

About.BungieCopyright: All images and content are property of Bungie. Please contact us if there are any issues.
About.FAQAccess: How does DIM get access to my Destiny data?
About.FAQAccessAnswer: Any chrome extension can ask for the data a website stores on your computer. When you log into Bungie.net, you are given a token (a cookie) that is generated uniquely for your account. You use this token to communicate with Bungie securely. The token is more secure than sending your username and password with each request to Bungie's server. DIM uses this token to communicate with Bungie on your behalf.
About.FAQKeyboardAnswer: Yes! Press "?" to see a list of available shortcuts.
About.FAQLogout: How can I log out of DIM?
About.FAQLogoutAnswer: Your session is tied to Bungie.net. If you logout on Bungie.net, you're effectively logged out of DIM.
About.FAQLostItem: I lost my item using your tool!
About.FAQLostItemAnswer: More than likely a transfer failed, leaving your item in the vault or on another character. You could search for the item. If that doesn't turn it up, refresh the app by pressing F5. Check Bungie.net or in game to see if your item still exists. We're sure it's still there.
About.GitHubHelp: If you're interested in contributing to the project, visit us at our project page on GitHub.
About.HowItsMade: DIM is built upon the same services used by Bungie.net and the Destiny Companion App. DIM can access the items within your Guardians inventory and the Vault for both PlayStation and Xbox. You then can drag and drop items anywhere you wish to move them.
About.RedditHelp: If you have questions, comments, or suggestions- let us know!
About.TwitterHelp: Be sure to follow us to stay on top of updates and realtime application state information.
About.TransifexText: We use Transifex for ease of translation. If you want to improve one of DIM's translations, join the team.

Support.FreeToDownload: DIM is a product that is free to download and use. The source code for DIM is open sourced, and free to anyone to enhance. You will never see an ad in DIM. That is our commitment.
Support.OpenCollective: We are using OpenCollective as a service to provide compensation to our developers for their dedication and time spent on this project.
Support.BackersDetail: Support us with a one-time or monthly donation and help us continue our active development.
Support.SponsorsDetail: Become a sponsor and get your logo here with a link to your site.

Views.UpgradeChrome: Your version of Chrome is too old to run DIM. Please update Chrome in order to use DIM.

Login.Explanation: Allow DIM to view and modify your Destiny characters, vault, and progression.
Login.LearnMore: Do you want to know more?
